website_summaries.verdict: This is a great choice if you're looking for a car vacuum or if you want a handheld vacuum that isn't limited by the length of a cord.
pros: Includes several specialized tools and an extension hose that stores on the unit
Powers through pet hair and stuck-on debris
Lightweight design with built-in carrying handle
cons: This vacuum is expensive for a handheld unit

customer_reviews.title: It's ok - I might have a lemon
customer_reviews.text: The suction was not as powerful as I was lead to believe by other reviewers. It's comparable to other non-corded handheld vacs. The vacuum also shuts down when using the roller brush tool for more than 30 seconds, and needs a few seconds before it restarts. I might have a defective model as no one else seems to have reported this.
customer_reviews.author: Cuervo Gold

customer_reviews.title: My l'il green monster...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase in as many months. I initially bought one for my recently-revamped garage. Fell in love. Battery seems to last forever and the suction is relatively strong for what this is; a cordless handheld. Hook up the motorized brush and nothing stops this little monster on short-pile carpets Like it so much I bought a 2nd one for my office and this 3rd one for my garage down in Cape Coral FL. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: peter2772000

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum, worry about the long term durability
customer_reviews.text: Chose this originally as it seemed to be a cross between a real vacuum and all of the cheap dust devils on Amazon. Can’t complain about the power, the dust trap, or all of the accessories that come with it. For cleaning out cars and picking up cat hair, it does a good job. Having real vacuum attachments,especially the pet hair power brush, is also a plus. Only thing that I dislike and wanted to bring up is the fit/finish off it. The dust trap is held together only by friction- no latches. As a consequence, Everything is hard to pull apart and put back in. It works, but worry about the long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: MT Dude

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this much money on a handheld vaccuum but I'm so glad I did!! We have a basset hound that thinks he's a lapdog and gets on every couch or recliner we own and sheds like crazy! I use this on our furniture as well as our van. I cleaned the entire van, every seat and every inch of the floor, on one battery charge and it was a champ! I swear the color of the inside of my van changed, this little dut guy did such a great job! Seriously a life saver for pet owners!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pros!
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as I like, but long lasting battery charge and so light weight and compact that I am keeping it!
customer_reviews.author: julia haberman

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why this is rated so high
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in February 2019. This has been one of the biggest duds we have ever purchased on Amazon. Worked pretty good for the first month but has since become completely useless. I have cleaned it, taken it completely apart looking for obstructions and found nothing. Motor sounds strong but can't even suck up bread crumbs from the counter. We can't return it because the window was only 30 days, so we are just going to have to toss it. Really bummed. $140 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last maybe 20 min at best. Suction power is not as strong as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Battery life is short so the vacuum often needs recharging. Last maybe 20 min at best. Suction power is not as strong as I want it to be. The extensions included are decent and give you flexibility for hard to reach areas. The vacuum is relatively light to carry with one hand. It can get the job done for small home cleaning duty but I would not recommend for cleaning out interiors for automotive-use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Now I have a real handheld vacuum, not a toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a workhorse and makes my past hand vacuums seem like toys. The battery lasts and lasts, the suction is strong, the design makes using easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great up until it didn't.
customer_reviews.text: I was literally thinking as I used this product for the last time how long the battery seemed to last between charges and remembering some reviews stating the opposite, I literally turned it off and my wife picked it up maybe two minutes later and when I saw her plug it in to charge asked why, it had four green bars showing while I was using it, it never ran or charged again. I bought it July 3rd and it quit December 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gadget. Powerful. Portable. Easy to use. Quick to charge. Good battery life. I have a dog and his hair are like little needles that stick into fabric I.e. couch, blankets, bed and the spinning brush attachment rips the hairs right out. Way better than any lint roller I’ve ever used and I’ve used just about every one on the market! Totally worth the money...for me anyway
customer_reviews.author: Pete M.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Just charged, hit power button and loud crack and jolt that almost knocked it out of my hand. Dust container partially came out. After that all it makes is very fast motor noise. I'm guessing the fan/impeller blade busted off. I was never really impressed with the suction. Sad, I've had a few Bissell products and had pretty good luck. I bought it thinking I could just replace the removable battery when worn out, unlike most where you just have to buy a new unit. Never thought the vacuum itself would break.
customer_reviews.author: MikeMikeWhiskey

customer_reviews.title: Small and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this unit! I give it a 4 out of five because it isn't the most powerful thing in the world. But that's to be expected with a battery powered unit. We bought this to use in our RV. We have 2 dogs (they shed a lot) that travel with us in the RV and this vacuum does 90% of the clean up! It's most effective with the roller brush. I'm not overly impressed with the overall suction power but again, I think that's to be expected with a batter powered unit. Other pros...it's easy to clean, charges pretty quickly, and once more for those in the back...the size is great! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Valcarcel

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, small, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is very powerful. I've had it several weeks now, and use it a lot more than I thought I would. I have two blind cabinets that I could never quite get clean in the corners, but with the handy extension tools, they are clean as a whistle. It is light-weight, and small enough that I can grab it for even the smallest jobs. It really is fun to use, and my house is cleaner than ever now. My granddaughter can make some powerful messes, but the Bissell makes cleaning up very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Donette Homra

customer_reviews.title: First one arrived with dead battery. Amazon sent replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived with dead battery. Amazon sent replacement. The replacement one ran about 8 months and is not turning on even after full charge.
customer_reviews.author: SAIF ALAM

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product, it has come very much in handy for quick pickup. The battery life is pretty good, one could not do a several thousand square foot home with out recharge, but it is great for a room sized job. It is not very heavy and easy to handle without becoming a burden. Very glad we picked it up for our cleaning tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Resistance is Futile!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: I use this for corners, dog and cat hair, spider webs, dirt, and everything in between. It has great suction and you absolutely cant beat the price. Would definitely buy again. Only bad part is it occasionally turns on by itself so i usually just take the battery off when im not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This cordless vacuum works very well and has the best suction of any I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This cordless vacuum works very well and has the best suction of any I've ever owned. Only drawback is the roller brush is difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: LReinhardt

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for window sills and baseboards!
customer_reviews.text: I hate lugging around my large vacuum and attaching the hose to clean the hard to reach places, so this is a life saver! The soft wand doesn't scratch woodwork and gets in those hard to reach corners. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair on bed and couches
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats, and I this mostly to vacuuming hair from the comforter and couches and I can typically get all the hair with one pass. I previously had a cheaper "pet hair" vacuum (~$50) that required going over the same area multiple times to pick up all the hair. My only complaints are that it didn't come with the small green extension pictured and I wish there were a long extension without the bristles. I guess the bristles help to prevent scratching surfaces, but they also catch a lot dust and hair that you then have to remove by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Klibisz

customer_reviews.title: IT DIDN'T WORK WHEN IT ARRIVED. I CALLED BISSEL--THEY ...
customer_reviews.text: IT DIDN'T WORK WHEN IT ARRIVED. I CALLED BISSEL--THEY SENT THE WRONG PART. IT IS HAS BEEN AT THE LOCAL WARRANTED BISSEL DEALER FOR REPAIR UNDER WARRANTY SINCE1/23/2018. I WAS TOLD, BY THE DEALER,ON MY FOLLOW UP CALL ON 1/25/2018 THAT THEY, DOUG'S VACUMN, THOUGHT THE PROBLEM WAS THE BATTERY AND THEY WOULD CALL WHEN IT WAS READY.
customer_reviews.author: rita balda

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! I use it constantly to clean bits of scattered litter, dust bunnies, etc. We just moved and there are bits of cardboard and sawdust everywhere. This is awesome and the first thing I unpacked when arriving.
customer_reviews.author: Liz P.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. It's great
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of appliances and loved a lot of men but the only time I've uttered the words "I couldn't live without" was followed by me talking about this friggin vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: J.Harrison

customer_reviews.title: DOA  had to return
customer_reviews.text: Last week I purchased the Bissel 1984 AirRam Cordless Vacuum and was so pleased with it, I decided to make this Hand Vac. . It arrived yesterday but it was DOA... battery would not charge. I am returning it and a replacement is on the way. I like the ease of return to Amazon, and just hope I like the product when I get one that works. Will update this review later. I am amazed at how quickly Amazon made the replacement. The new one charged quickly and I think I will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kittle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the best handheld vac I've ever owned. It has good power, useful attachments, so far battery life is good. I particularly like the upholstery attachment for cleaning the stairs and of course the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with Power Brush attachment
customer_reviews.text: Great Power Head and battery life. Our unit was faulty and after contacting BISSELL directly the power switch module was sent to us, free of charge, and that solved the problem. Really need a second filter, while it takes forever to dry after a soap & water wash..
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: Had others that don’t come close to this. The battery is great. It works great. Suction is powerful and doesn’t fade while you are using it. My friend is going to get one now. She owns a Dyson and this is far better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had for a little over 4 months and only been ...
customer_reviews.text: Had for a little over 4 months and only been used maybe 5 times. Shows a charged battery but turn it on and has little power and after 5 seconds turns off and shows 4 red lines.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: It works better than I thought. I have bought another matress vaccum of other brand. This one is far more better. I did suck out a lot of dust. After that, the allergic symptoms of my kids improved.
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: I thought I’d save a few dollars and go with ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d save a few dollars and go with this one instead of the dyson. Huge mistake! I read reviews that the suction power stops working after a while and sure enough, after maybe 10 uses, it stopped sucking properly. I’m sending it back for a few refund and going with the dyson for $60 more. What a hassle!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low engineering quality-on/off button
customer_reviews.text: The on/off is so hard to press on so i cannot operate the button! At first it was a bit stiff, but after 5 operations only It is so hard to press the button that I can not turn on the device! Very low quality of engineering.
customer_reviews.author: neta dahan hason

customer_reviews.title: I love this handy little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this handy little vacuum. I use it for carpeted stairs, cars, furniture and any other little spaces that need a quick clean. Battery life is decent. Suction is decent considering it's a handheld unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best Cordless EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST cordless vacuum I have ever used! I use it on car carpets and on our stairs. I convinced my daughter to purchase one for her house, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mike from Healdsburg, CA

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for small jobs. I had actually just purchased a Dyson hand vac at Costco for $160 and then found this on prime day. The only noticeable difference to me is this one is slightly heavier and the on/off button is kind of akward in its location. I did not compare battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Doyle

customer_reviews.title: would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful enough for household duties. Lots of great accessories. easy to use. Only thing is, I would like a wall-mount to hold it plus all the accessories. Just have to leave them sitting on the floor the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: T.Swift

customer_reviews.title: Great Design.
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my office. The rotating head really makes a difference. Quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Joe joe

customer_reviews.title: lots of nice attachments. I use this to suck up alot ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, lots of nice attachments. I use this to suck up alot of very fine particle cat litter and it does an excellent job. Best handheld I have come across
customer_reviews.author: Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Ok vacuum but a few dealbreakers
customer_reviews.text: Good: - Looks cool / good power / good attachments Bad: - Stuff gets stuck in ribbed air channel - Washable filter too hard to dry, smells like mold after a wash If these bad attributes were fixed, id buy
customer_reviews.author: home cook

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is okay when you use the smaller add ons but it really does loose a lot of its suction power with the long one and the pull out cord is just awful. If it was $50, okay but not worth the cost at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, I will still buy it next time.
customer_reviews.author: HUANG,LI-CHEN

customer_reviews.title: Suction sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for cleaning my carpeted stairs and couch. Having a husky, I needed a motorized head handheld. The overall design with tools and motorized head is good, but does not have enough suction. On top of that, it kicks up a lot of the dirt and doesn't trap it in the waste container. Should have spent $150 elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nova Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Picks up well but battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, however, the battery life sucks and I didn't like how the part with the extender doesn't extend as far as I'd hoped it would. It does a good job picking up.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: the power is not very good at all
customer_reviews.text: It showed up broken, so returned it. Additionally, the power is not very good at all. Went with a Eureka and love it.
customer_reviews.author: shaunoxster

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: If you have an RV and have limited storage space, this vacuum is a must have. Small and lightweight, yet very powerful and versatile. I have a class B, use this every couple days and I’ve only recharged it once. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a year despite minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Barely used this product throughout this past year, nozzle broke fairly early on but was still functional. Today, it stopped working entirely. Won’t turn on despite being charged. Haven’t been this disappointed with a Bissell brand product before. Don’t recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Single hose sucks
customer_reviews.text: The suction of the single hose sucks...when u pull it out to use it has little power to suck.
customer_reviews.author: jeng xiong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this sucks up so much stuff when I vacuumed on my bed... I'm amazed. Good little machine
customer_reviews.author: EVA

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have used this vacume 3 times in 4 months since it is only to clean minor messes, it already does not work
customer_reviews.author: LKN

customer_reviews.title: not as powerful as a big vacuum cleaner to clean a car.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, battery life very good. Just a little less suction power than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Talie

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean up mite from the bed, then my allergy is better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well, good battery power. Just a little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Zay Lin

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with the motorized brush. This makes cleaning cat ...
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with the motorized brush. This makes cleaning cat litter and stairways so much easier. I just wish it had a longer battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help keep pet hair at bay on our furniture. It definitely does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Freels

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Thought my house was clean. This vacuum proved it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: I really like all the features of this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I really like all the features of this vacuum. I've had so many cordless vacs that never last and finally splurged and spent the money on this. So far, I'm not having any issues. The hardest thing is getting the power head off after I've used it. I hope that will get a little easier and it almost feels like I could break something. I've only had this a short time and haven't used it that often so we'll see how long it lasts. I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I find the design awkward. I am happiest when using the brush rather than the wand.
customer_reviews.author: Ardha Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it... don't hear any complaints, so, must be doin' the job!
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived late. Charged it for nearly 3 hours. Cleaned my car and it was not as powerful as I thought it would be. Disappointed. Returning it asap.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Doe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to deal with the shedding hair from my Beagle. It works very well, it is great for cars as well, and my adult daughter loved it and now has it on her Christmas wish list!
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Moller

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Makes the housecleaning easier
customer_reviews.text: Recently, I just bought Multi Reach Cordless Hard Floor Stick and Hand Vacuum for my family. Great product. Makes the housecleaning easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny beast that deserves a name
customer_reviews.text: I methodically removed and reattached each little satisfying nozzle and gizmo for about 30mins when I first got this. It's an awesome looking machine, and feels great in your hand. Lots of satisfying, well-made clicks and attachments, and seems to do a very good job of cleaning pet hair from the sofa / couch. Can't wait to take it for a spin inside the car, with all its thin nozzles and extendable hoses. It's a tiny beast. Ima call him Kevin.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklantic

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great for doing stairs and also have used it on my auto carpets so far so good we are loving this product
customer_reviews.author: christopher humble

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice unit but the suction is not as great as i was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Schwamlein

customer_reviews.title: Cordless handheld vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Use it on pretty much anything. Easy to take around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs More Strength
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for something with more strength to use for quick pick-ups, e.g. cat hair, cat litter tracked outside the box, etc. I use it in my car. Perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: James Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.text: This little vac is a beast, and the tools are top notch. Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: C. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice n powerful vacuum. it is smaller than i thought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not do the job that I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: Bought to pick up swept up piles of Golden Retriever hair but didn't have enough suction to pull it up and into the unit. Hair just clogged up the opening. Also had to bend down so far to get to the floor. Might be alright for other chores (not tried) but couldn't replace a broom and dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: David Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: But the vacuum is bad quality. Bissell don't check before shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vacuum on Dec 21 at AMAZON. But the vacuum is bad quality. Bissell don't check before shipping? The vacuum can't work. That's a bad gift to my family. Really bad shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power in your hand.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't just for your car. I bought it for doing my stairs. It's hard to get an upright on them to vacuum but this is perfect. The suction is very strong and the powered beater really works. The other attachments are handy, including a flexable hose that stores in the tube. Battery life has not been a problem after 25min. Still plenty of charge. easy to clean too. You'll love this. Bissell makes good products.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: great battery power
customer_reviews.text: once charged, it can use longer then my dyson, suction is not power then dyson, but for the price difference, im more then happy to buy this, handle is easy to hold and actually have great grip to use it, it comes with many different accessory to fit in different place, overall, great buy
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Donglas

customer_reviews.title: IF you can get it to turn on...
customer_reviews.text: Unit works, when you can get it to turn on. I gave this as a gift almost 6 months ago, and just found out today that the on/off switch has been defective since new. Now it's too late to return it. After mashing the power button a few times, it will finally turn on and off. Once running, this thing seems to work pretty good for a cordless vac. Even has a little hose so you can get tight spots without having to heft the entire unit. Another thing: There is no way to mount this on a wall to get it out of the way, so make sure you have some shelf or floor space.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. E.

customer_reviews.title: great suction
customer_reviews.text: great product. - it only last 15 minutes on a full charge (8 hours). however, i do prep the car before i start using. i live in an apartment complex, so running a long extension cord is not feasible without tripping people walking down the stairs. suction is great. i have not used the marble test, but i would be surprised if it did not pick up a few marbles. - works great on pet hair. - filters are easily washable.
customer_reviews.author: AJMF

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality, lightweight, well made little vacuum, with lot's of power. I've never run out of juice, using it for short periods, of course--maybe up to ten minutes, with no diminishing power, so could have gone longer. I was wary of the power with the cordless feature, but that won't disappoint you. Having the freedom of no tether (cord) is wonderful, five stars for that alone. You'll like the quality and the comfortable ergonomic handle. Easy cleaning the debris collector. Charges sitting on it's built-in stand. The light actually helps--didn't think I'd care about that. My only small complaint would be a hard-sided housing box would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: girlcook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pets and Cars!
customer_reviews.text: As good as the reviews say! Great suction and battery life.can’t wait to clean my car. FYI the hidden narrow concentrator nozzle on back of vac fits in extension nozzle. Plan to use both to vacuum in between console and car seats. Smart design! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Targetxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly versatile, powerful, and light.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazingly versatile, although I would have liked a wall mount. The suction is strong enough for a rug or even the car carpet. The built in hose is handy and the rotating brush attachment is strong. The whole thing is light and easy to use for long periods of time and the battery lasts a really long time. It can vacuum my 2 cars and their trunks and still have battery life remaining. The ability to buy extra batteries means this vacuum won't be garbage when the battery eventually wears out. Unlike so many other handheld vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: NorthWind

customer_reviews.title: good battery, needs better suction
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were a bit more powerful, but battery is great
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Nice little vacuum. A lot better than a dust buster. This takes care of pet hair on chair cushions and is great on carpeted stairs or minor spills when dragging out a big vacuum is more of a chore. It could have had a slightly stronger suction but otherwise the beater bar makes it very effective. The battery lasts through 3-4 through stairs cleanings (12 steps).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fix It

customer_reviews.title: Great, but, not for me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for use in my rig, works great, when its charged, sucks up most dirt and dust, but struggles with some stones. Filter plugs with dust real quick. Starting to think I shouldve went for the 1gal shop vac. However it's great for around the house in tight spaces and quick cleanup jobs in the car and what not. Just not suitable for my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nilson

customer_reviews.title: I love the versatility with all the extra parts
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and very powerful suction. I love the versatility with all the extra parts. As long as you are aware that this is a cordless vac and you understand the juice time is about 15-25 minutes depending on the job and the attachment piece, you should really enjoy it. I have powerful corded vac for the whole house big cleaning jobs. But for quick touch ups and per room cleaning it's very convenient. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and effective
customer_reviews.text: Unit has a motor-driven brush attachment which does a great job on carpet and on stairs. Power is excellent but the unit is not rapid-charge so if the battery is run down to near zero, it will take roughly 6 hours to get up to full charge again. Cleaning the vacuum is simple, and I would recommend also buying extra filters (15.99 for a two pack).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! It's very powerful, its lightweight, and I love all the attachments. My only complaint quid be that I wish the extendable hose was longer, but I understand you have to also have somewhere to put it when not in use. Overall it's a great purchase and a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Bear

customer_reviews.title: I like the attachments
customer_reviews.text: Got this about a month ago. Its powerful. I like the attachments. I'm also grateful that the cardboard box that they ship it in can be reused for storage...as it is great to store the attachments. It makes senses to me, meaning its easy to figure out how to use. If I had one concern it would be that the attachments aren't easily stored on the device...so it is an extra box or item around the house...I'm working on streamlining these things. Otherwise, I think its a great device and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not great suction
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small vacuum. I have to stoop over to do baseboards which is exactly what I was trying to avoid. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Parsley

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that sheds a lot with a medium length coat and I use this vacuum weekly if not daily. I use it on area rugs and my dogs bed or just to clean up small messes. I also have used it in the car. I like this one so much I bought one for my parents. The only complaint they had was it was a little heavy to use on the many stairs they have. I dont find the weight a problem, but others might.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The power is very good and almost clean every single particle and unvisible stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum twice and first for my room and another for my mom. The power is very good and almost clean every single particle and unvisible stuff away. I did not give 5 stars b/c after several vacuum with my pet fur. there are pet smell everytime you turn it on. if you have pet, please buy a pet filter.
customer_reviews.author: Wasabi~~

customer_reviews.title: Good suction for a hand held.
customer_reviews.text: Good hand held vacum with good suction. Its not like shopvac suction, but for a hand held vacun its pretty good. I use it mostly for my car. I had many 20-40 bucks hand held vacum with very weak suction. This vacum is not like that. It has a decent suction that is enough for ur car.
customer_reviews.author: porkfryrye

customer_reviews.title: No Suction
customer_reviews.text: No appreciable suction. Lots of pieces one would rarely if ever use. Nice grey color with green accents. But functionality is zip.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Can't Review since the damn thing wouldn't charge. Wanted an additional $35 to buy a new one. I'll go to eBay.
customer_reviews.text: The one I received did not charge. Had to return it. Went to buy a replacement and the price had gone up by $35. VERY unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Minij

customer_reviews.title: Good compact vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Battery life doesn't seem to be the greatest. Works really nice to keep in car for messes. Has nice vacuum power.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not great for carpeted stairs
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot heavier than expected. It is not particularly great on carpeted stairs since the brush mechanism is plastic. But it is adequate for overall minor pickups.
customer_reviews.author: onceaparisienne

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this small vacuum! The suction power is amazing! The only downfall is the short battery life. But overall, it's great a great small vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Starrsa

customer_reviews.title: Great for homes with pets and kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget! It's great for stairs, small areas and getting into corners. We have 3 cats and it is truly a lifesaver. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Chynna06

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase so far.
customer_reviews.text: Great little car vac! Run time is good, perfect for anyone who doesn't have an outlet near to keep the car looking good. Suction is decent for what it is. Would have given 5 stars if the hose were a little longer and if it came with a bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for about a month and very satisfied with it. Cleans great, and battery life is very good. Motorized brush is a great feature. A little hard to change attachments, but may just need some break-in time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ward

customer_reviews.title: it really sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: It really sucks and cleans, and works great in my car. Great engineering!
customer_reviews.author: eMerc

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I cannot convey how wonderful this vacuum is. The suction is top notch and the eases of use makes this my go-to vac for all small (and larger) messes. Highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that we dislike is that it will not hold the charge long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia R. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great hand held vacuum to do quick cleanups on couches and in cars. Some of the attachments are a little awkward to us in the sense that they don't sit in a way to vacuum crumbs, but it is versatile and easy to use. Definite addition to my cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we use it every week to vacumn the kids beds and sofa. No more bug bites
customer_reviews.author: HAOJU TSENG

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easier than pulling out my larger vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful! Love the extension wand for tight areas, corners, ceilings, under cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BISSELL Lightweight Cordless Hand Vacuum and Car Vacuum, 1985,Green Multi Hand Vac
product_meta.description: There are hand vacuums and then there's the Bissell multi cordless hand vac. Equipped with high-performance, cordless technology it's engineered for versatile cleaning in even the hardest to reach spots. Powered by a removable, professional-grade, 22V lithium ion battery this lightweight, ergonomically designed hand vacuum delivers total cleaning comfort with up to 15 minutes of fade free suction. For maximized versatility, it includes multiple specialized tools and attachments, including a built-in extension hose, motorized brush roll, extension wand, crevice tool, and soft-dusting brush. And once you've tackled that mess, its removable dirt bin with an easy empty lid makes for a quick, mess-free empty. When it comes to hand vacuums, Bissell multi cordless hand vacuum is unlike anything you've ever put your hands on.
feature_bullets: Equipped with high performance cordless technology and engineered for versatile cleaning in hard to reach spots
Includes multiple specialized tools, including built-in extension hose, stored on board for quick and easy access
Powerful, motorized brush roll easily lifts and removes pet hair from carpets and upholstery
Lightweight, ergonomic design with comfort soft grips for total cleaning control and comfort
Professional-grade, 22V lithium Ion battery provides up to 15 minutes of fade-free power; Dirt Cup Capacity:0.4L
